document.discussion_title: A Time to be Silent and a Time to Speak
document.topic_text: Sunday morning services 9 am and 10:45 am Summer Services 10 am Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age. Matthew 28:19-20
